verses.verse: Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>: Thou art to pass over <WH5674> <WH8802> Yarden <WH3383> this day <WH3117>, to go in <WH935> <WH8800> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than thyself, cities <WH5892> great <WH1419> and fenced up <WH1219> <WH8803> to heaven <WH8064>,

A people <WH5971> great <WH1419> and tall <WH7311> <WH8802>, the children <WH1121> of the Anakims <WH6062>, whom thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804>, and of whom thou hast heard <WH8085> <WH8804> say, Who can stand <WH3320> <WH8691> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Anak <WH6061> !

Understand <WH3045> <WH8804> therefore this day <WH3117>, that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> is he which goeth over <WH5674> <WH8802> before <WH6440> thee; as a consuming <WH398> <WH8802> fire <WH784> he shall destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> them, and he shall bring them down <WH3665> <WH8686> before thy face <WH6440>: so shalt thou drive them out <WH3423> <WH8689>, and destroy <WH6> <WH8689> them quickly <WH4118>, as the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thee.

Speak <WH559> <WH8799> not thou in thine heart <WH3824>, after that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath cast them out <WH1920> <WH8800> from before <WH6440> thee, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, For my righteousness <WH6666> the YY <WH3068> hath brought me in <WH935> <WH8689> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> this land <WH776>: but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these nations <WH1471> the YY <WH3068> doth drive them out <WH3423> <WH8688> from before <WH6440> thee.

Not for thy righteousness <WH6666>, or for the uprightness <WH3476> of thine heart <WH3824>, dost thou go <WH935> <WH8802> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> their land <WH776>: but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these nations <WH1471> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> doth drive them out <WH3423> <WH8688> from before <WH6440> thee, and that he may perform <WH6965> <WH8687> the word <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto thy fathers <WH1>, Avraham <WH85>, Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and Ya`akov <WH3290>.

Understand <WH3045> <WH8804> therefore, that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee not this good <WH2896> land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> <WH8800> it for thy righteousness <WH6666>; for thou art a stiffnecked <WH6203> <WH7186> people <WH5971>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, and forget <WH7911> <WH8799> not, how thou provokedst the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> to wrath <WH7107> <WH8689> in the wilderness <WH4057>: from <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that thou didst depart out <WH3318> <WH8804> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, until ye came <WH935> <WH8800> unto this place <WH4725>, ye have been rebellious <WH4784> <WH8688> against <WH5973> the YY <WH3068>.
Also in Horev <WH2722> ye provoked <WH7107> the YY <WH3068> to wrath <WH7107> <WH8689>, so that the YY <WH3068> was angry <WH599> <WH8691> with you to have destroyed <WH8045> <WH8687> you.

When I was gone up <WH5927> <WH8800> into the mount <WH2022> to receive <WH3947> <WH8800> the tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> which the YY <WH3068> made <WH3772> <WH8804> with you, then I abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in the mount <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>, I neither did eat <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899> nor drink <WH8354> <WH8804> water <WH4325>:

And the YY <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> unto me two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> written <WH3789> <WH8803> with the finger <WH676> of 'Elohim <WH430>; and on them was written according to all the words <WH1697>, which the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> with you in the mount <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly <WH6951>.

And it came to pass at the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>, that the YY <WH3068> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> me the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68>, even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, get thee down <WH3381> <WH8798> quickly <WH4118> from hence; for thy people <WH5971> which thou hast brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714> have corrupted <WH7843> <WH8765> themselves; they are quickly <WH4118> turned aside <WH5493> <WH8804> out of the way <WH1870> which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them; they have made <WH6213> <WH8804> them a molten image <WH4541>.

Furthermore the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> this people <WH5971>, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked <WH6203> <WH7186> people <WH5971>:

Let me alone <WH7503> <WH8685>, that I may destroy <WH8045> <WH8686> them, and blot out <WH4229> <WH8799> their name <WH8034> from under heaven <WH8064>: and I will make <WH6213> <WH8799> of <WH854> thee a nation <WH1471> mightier <WH6099> and greater <WH7227> than they.

So I turned <WH6437> <WH8799> and came down <WH3381> <WH8799> from the mount <WH2022>, and the mount <WH2022> burned <WH1197> <WH8802> with fire <WH784>: and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> were in my two <WH8147> hands <WH3027>.

And I looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, ye had sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and had made <WH6213> <WH8804> you a molten <WH4541> calf <WH5695>: ye had turned aside <WH5493> <WH8804> quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which the YY <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you.

And I took <WH8610> <WH8799> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> them out of <WH5921> my two <WH8147> hands <WH3027>, and brake <WH7665> <WH8762> them before your eyes <WH5869>.

And I fell down <WH5307> <WH8691> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, as at the first <WH7223>, forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>: I did neither eat <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899>, nor drink <WH8354> <WH8804> water <WH4325>, because of all your sins <WH2403> which ye sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, in doing <WH6213> <WH8800> wickedly <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, to provoke him to anger <WH3707> <WH8687>.

For I was afraid <WH3025> <WH8804> of <WH6440> the anger <WH639> and hot displeasure <WH2534>, wherewith the YY <WH3068> was wroth <WH7107> <WH8804> against you to destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> you. But the YY <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> unto me at that time <WH6471> also.

And the YY <WH3068> was very <WH3966> angry <WH599> <WH8694> with Aharon <WH175> to have destroyed <WH8045> <WH8687> him: and I prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> for Aharon <WH175> also the same time <WH6256>.

And I took <WH3947> <WH8804> your sin <WH2403>, the calf <WH5695> which ye had made <WH6213> <WH8804>, and burnt <WH8313> <WH8799> it with fire <WH784>, and stamped <WH3807> <WH8799> it, and ground <WH2912> <WH8800> it very small <WH3190> <WH8687>, even until it was as small <WH1854> <WH8804> as dust <WH6083>: and I cast <WH7993> <WH8686> the dust <WH6083> thereof into the brook <WH5158> that descended out <WH3381> <WH8802> of the mount <WH2022>.
And at Taberah <WH8404>, and at Massah <WH4532>, and at Kibrothhattaavah <WH6914>, ye provoked the YY <WH3068> to wrath <WH7107> <WH8688>.

Likewise when the YY <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH8800> you from Kadeshbarnea <WH6947>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Go up <WH5927> <WH8798> and possess <WH3423> <WH8798> the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> you; then ye rebelled <WH4784> <WH8686> against the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and ye believed <WH539> <WH8689> him not, nor hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> to his voice <WH6963>.
Ye have been rebellious <WH4784> <WH8688> against the YY <WH3068> from the day <WH3117> that I knew <WH3045> <WH8800> you.

Thus I fell down <WH5307> <WH8691> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>, as I fell down <WH5307> <WH8694> at the first; because the YY <WH3068> had said <WH559> <WH8804> he would destroy <WH8045> <WH8687> you.

I prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> therefore unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> not thy people <WH5971> and thine inheritance <WH5159>, which thou hast redeemed <WH6299> <WH8804> through thy greatness <WH1433>, which thou hast brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> thy servants <WH5650>, Avraham <WH85>, Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and Ya`akov <WH3290>; look <WH6437> <WH8799> not unto the stubbornness <WH7190> of this people <WH5971>, nor to their wickedness <WH7562>, nor to their sin <WH2403>:

Lest the land <WH776> whence thou broughtest us out <WH3318> <WH8689> say <WH559> <WH8799>, Because the YY <WH3068> was not able <WH3201> <WH8800> to bring <WH935> <WH8687> them into the land <WH776> which he promised <WH1696> <WH8765> them, and because he hated <WH8135> them, he hath brought them out <WH3318> <WH8689> to slay <WH4191> <WH8687> them in the wilderness <WH4057>.

Yet they are thy people <WH5971> and thine inheritance <WH5159>, which thou broughtest out <WH3318> <WH8689> by thy mighty <WH1419> power <WH3581> and by thy stretched out <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>.
